Deprecated API

Deprecated Classes
interbase.interclient.ConnectionProperties
          deprecated since InterClient 2.0, replaced by DataSource API. 
 

Deprecated Methods
interbase.interclient.ResultSet.getBigDecimal(int, int)
          To be deprecated in InterClient 2, replaced by getBigDecimal(column) without scale in JDBC 2 
interbase.interclient.CallableStatement.getBigDecimal(int, int)
          To be deprecated in InterClient 2, replaced by getBigDecimal(parameterIndex) without scale in JDBC 2 
interbase.interclient.ResultSet.getBigDecimal(String, int)
          To be deprecated in InterClient 2, replaced by getBigDecimal(columnName) without scale in JDBC 2 
interbase.interclient.PreparedStatement.getResultSetMetaData()
          To be deprecated in InterClient 2, replaced by getMetaData() in JDBC 2. 
interbase.interclient.ResultSet.getUnicodeStream(int)
          To be deprecated in InterClient 2, replaced by getCharacterStream(column) in JDBC 2. 
interbase.interclient.ResultSet.getUnicodeStream(String)
          To be deprecated in InterClient 2, replaced by getCharacterStream(columnName) in JDBC 2. 
interbase.interclient.ConnectionProperties.setCharacterEncoding(String)
          To be deprecated in InterClient 2, replaced by DataSource API. 
interbase.interclient.PreparedStatement.setUnicodeStream(int, InputStream, int)
          To be deprecated in InterClient 2, replaced by setCharacterStream(parameterIndex, reader, length) in JDBC 2 
interbase.interclient.ConnectionProperties.setUser(String, String)
          To be deprecated in InterClient 2, replaced by DataSource API. 
 

Deprecated Constructors
interbase.interclient.ConnectionProperties()
          To be deprecated in InterClient 2, replaced by DataSource API.
